pluggable.name: StatusNet
pluggable.author: The Habari Community
pluggable.description: Post to and display from StatusNet µblog servers.

help.value:
For the µblog service setting, enter the portion of your µblog service home page URL between the slash at the end of http:// and the slash before your user name: http://statusnet.service/yourname.

To use identi.ca, for example, since your URL is something like http://identi.ca/yourname, you would enter identi.ca.

To display your latest notices, call $theme->statusnet(); at the appropriate place in your theme.
